item.description:
Hi folks! Let's warm up on a cold January day, with some exercise and friendly conversation, while we walk through the wintery woods and celebrate the lengthening days with friends both old and new! This Meetup will take place at Chatfield Hollow State Park, which is a state park located in Killingworth, CT. Snow is no deterrent, barring treacherous driving conditions!!

$2 DONATION: Please contribute a minimum donation of two dollars towards the fee that is charged by the Meetup Website.  Please email organizer directly and in advance if you have questions or concerns regarding this suggested donation.  Please also note that members who arrive without donations for any reason have always been welcomed with warmth and without question.

WHEN AND WHERE: As usual, plan to arrive five minutes early.

Meet at the outer parking area at 11:55 or 12:00 and head out at five after.

DIRECTIONS: From I-95: take Exit 63, and follow Route 81 north to Route 80 west. Drive about 1.2 miles west on Route 80 and look for park entrance on your right (it comes up quick). Google map / Directions to park

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: NH Walks' Post-Holiday Debrief / Low-Pressure Gathering (Chatfield Hollow)
